specialMessages.title: Takeaway orders only
specialMessages.message: Darius Pizza is open for takeaway orders only and does not have a dining area.

specialMessages.title: Orders by phone or on-site
specialMessages.message: You can place your order by phone or on-site. We advise you to contact us as early as possible to avoid waiting.

specialMessages.title: No delivery available
specialMessages.message: Darius Pizza does not offer delivery. You can place your order by phone or on-site. You will need to pick up your order in person.
